languages.text: "Видите ли, Ваша Светлость, он несколько... сломался. Когда сервиторы подключали его к машинной искре — вдруг раздались страшные звуки и запах... был просто ужасен. Однако моя просьба о починке привела технопровидцев в столь яростное негодование, что я не решился боле докучать им расспросами. Увы, со временем запах стал совсем невыносим, да еще и эти трупные черви..." {n}Бросив на вас виноватый взгляд, Фактотум тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Словом, когитатор пришлось утилизировать. Приношу глубочайшие извинения за то, что не сумел сберечь сей образец тассерианской культуры".

traits.locale_text: "Видите ли, Ваша Светлость, он несколько... сломался. Когда сервиторы подключали его к машинной искре — вдруг раздались страшные звуки и запах... был просто ужасен. Однако моя просьба о починке привела технопровидцев в столь яростное негодование, что я не решился боле докучать им расспросами. Увы, со временем запах стал совсем невыносим, да еще и эти трупные черви..." {n}Бросив на вас виноватый взгляд, Фактотум тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Словом, когитатор пришлось утилизировать. Приношу глубочайшие извинения за то, что не сумел сберечь сей образец тассерианской культуры".

languages.text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a tad... broken. While the servitors were busy connecting it to the machine spark, terrifying noises were suddenly heard, followed by a... horrible smell. However, my request to have it repaired so infuriated the Enginseers that I dared not pester them with any further questions. Alas, after a while, the stench became unbearable, and then came the maggots..." {n}The Factotum casts a guilty glance at you and sighs heavily.{/n} "To put it briefly, the Cogicor had to be disposed of. I offer my deepest apologies for failing to preserve that specimen of Thasserian culture."
languages.original_text: "Видите ли, Ваша Светлость, он несколько... сломался. Когда сервиторы подключали его к машинной искре — вдруг раздались страшные звуки и запах... был просто ужасен. Однако моя просьба о починке привела технопровидцев в столь яростное негодование, что я не решился боле докучать им расспросами. Увы, со временем запах стал совсем невыносим, да еще и эти трупные черви..." {n}Бросив на вас виноватый взгляд, Фактотум тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Словом, когитатор пришлось утилизировать. Приношу глубочайшие извинения за то, что не сумел сберечь сей образец тассерианской культуры".

traits.locale_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a tad... broken. When servitors were connecting it to the machine spark, suddenly there were terrifying sounds, and the smell... was simply horrible. However, my request to have it repaired so infuriated the Enginseers that I dared not pester them with any further questions. Alas, after a while, the smell became unbearable, and then there were the maggots..." {n}The Factotum casts a guilty glance at you, and sighs heavily.{/n} "To put it briefly, the Cogicor had to be disposed of. I offer my deepest apologies for failing to preserve that specimen of Thasserian culture."

"You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a tad... broken. When servitors were connecting it to the machine spark, suddenly there were terrifying sounds, and the smell... was simply horrible. However, my request to have it repaired so infuriated the Enginseers that I dared not pester them with any further questions. Alas, after a while, the smell became unbearable, and then there were the maggots..." {n}The Factotum casts a guilty glance at you, and sighs heavily.{/n} "To put it briefly, the Cogicor had to be disposed of. I offer my deepest apologies for failing to preserve that specimen of Thasserian culture."

I offer my deepest apologies for failing to preserve that specimen of Thasserian culture."

Alas, after a while, the stench became unbearable, and then came the maggots..." {n}The Factotum casts a guilty glance at you and sighs heavily.{/n} "To put it briefly, the Cogicor had to be disposed of. I offer my deepest apologies for failing to preserve that specimen of Thasserian culture."

languages.text: "Nun ja, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, er ist sozusagen ... kaputt. Als die Servitoren ihn an den Maschinenfunken anschlossen, waren plötzlich furchtbare Geräusche zu hören, gefolgt von einem ... schrecklichen Geruch. Meine Anfrage, ihn zu reparieren, hat die Maschinenseher so erzürnt, dass ich es nicht gewagt habe, sie mit weiteren Fragen zu belästigen. Leider wurde der Gestank nach einiger Zeit unerträglich, und dann kamen die Maden ..." {n}Das Faktotum wirft dir einen schuldbewussten Blick zu und seufzt schwer.{/n} "Um es kurz zu machen, wir mussten den Cogicor entsorgen. Ich entschuldige mich vielmals dafür, dass ich dieses Exemplar der Kultur von Thassera nicht retten konnte."
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a tad... broken. While the servitors were busy connecting it to the machine spark, terrifying noises were suddenly heard, followed by a... horrible smell. However, my request to have it repaired so infuriated the Enginseers that I dared not pester them with any further questions. Alas, after a while, the stench became unbearable, and then came the maggots..." {n}The Factotum casts a guilty glance at you and sighs heavily.{/n} "To put it briefly, the Cogicor had to be disposed of. I offer my deepest apologies for failing to preserve that specimen of Thasserian culture."

Leider wurde der Gestank nach einiger Zeit unerträglich, und dann kamen die Maden ..." {n}Das Faktotum wirft dir einen schuldbewussten Blick zu und seufzt schwer.{/n} "Um es kurz zu machen, wir mussten den Cogicor entsorgen. Ich entschuldige mich vielmals dafür, dass ich dieses Exemplar der Kultur von Thassera nicht retten konnte."

languages.text: « Pour tout vous dire, Votre Seigneurie, il est légèrement... cassé. Pendant que les servitors tentaient de le connecter à l'étincelle de la machine, des bruits terrifiants se sont soudain fait entendre, suivis d'une... odeur abominable. Cependant, les technaugures se sont tellement énervés lorsque je leur ai demandé de le réparer que je n'ai pas osé leur poser davantage de questions. Hélas, la puanteur a fini par devenir intolérable, puis les asticots sont arrivés... » {n}Le factotum vous lance un regard coupable et pousse un long soupir.{/n} « En bref, nous avons dû jeter le Cogicor. Je vous présente mes plus plates excuses pour avoir été incapable de préserver ce spécimen de la culture thasserienne. »
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a tad... broken. While the servitors were busy connecting it to the machine spark, terrifying noises were suddenly heard, followed by a... horrible smell. However, my request to have it repaired so infuriated the Enginseers that I dared not pester them with any further questions. Alas, after a while, the stench became unbearable, and then came the maggots..." {n}The Factotum casts a guilty glance at you and sighs heavily.{/n} "To put it briefly, the Cogicor had to be disposed of. I offer my deepest apologies for failing to preserve that specimen of Thasserian culture."

traits.locale_text: « Pour tout vous dire, Votre Seigneurie, il est légèrement... cassé. Pendant que les servitors tentaient de le connecter à l'étincelle de la machine, des bruits terrifiants se sont soudain fait entendre, suivis d'une... odeur abominable. Cependant, les technaugures se sont tellement énervés lorsque je leur ai demandé de le réparer que je n'ai pas osé leur poser davantage de questions. Hélas, la puanteur a fini par devenir intolérable, puis les asticots sont arrivés... » {n}Le factotum vous lance un regard coupable et pousse un long soupir.{/n} « En bref, nous avons dû jeter le Cogicor. Je vous présente mes plus plates excuses pour avoir été incapable de préserver ce spécimen de la culture thasserienne. »

languages.text: “如您所见，大人，这台装置有点……损坏了。当时，那些机仆正忙着把它与源力连接起来，但装置突然爆发出了恐怖的声音，随后是……糟糕的味道。我要求引擎先知把那台机器修好，但我这个要求好像惹怒了他们，于是我再也不敢和他们提这件事情。糟糕的是，过了一段时间之后，臭味变得越来越刺鼻，还长出了……蛆虫……”{n}高阶顾问满怀愧疚地看了你一眼，沉重地叹了口气。{/n}“总而言之，我不得不处理掉那台‘沉司哲’。我未能保护好来自塔瑟拉的文化遗产，为此，我向您致以最深切的歉意。”
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a tad... broken. Alas, after a while, the stench became unbearable, and then came the maggots..." {n}The Factotum casts a guilty glance at you and sighs heavily.{/n} "To put it briefly, the Cogicor had to be disposed of. languages.text: «Verá, mi{mf|lord|lady}, está un poco... roto. Mientras los servidores se afanaban en conectarlo con la chispa de la máquina, se oyeron unos ruidos aterradores, seguidos de un... olor espantoso. Sin embargo, mi solicitud de repararlo enfureció tanto a los visioingenieros que no osé importunarlos con más preguntas. Por desgracia, después de un tiempo, el hedor se volvió insoportable, y después llegaron los gusanos...». {n}El Factótum te lanza una mirada culpable y suspira con pesadez.{/n} «En pocas palabras, ha sido necesario destruir el cogicor. Mis más sinceras disculpas por no haber conseguido preservar tal espécimen de la cultura thasseriana».
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a tad... broken. While the servitors were busy connecting it to the machine spark, terrifying noises were suddenly heard, followed by a... horrible smell. However, my request to have it repaired so infuriated the Enginseers that I dared not pester them with any further questions. Alas, after a while, the stench became unbearable, and then came the maggots..." {n}The Factotum casts a guilty glance at you and sighs heavily.{/n} "To put it briefly, the Cogicor had to be disposed of. I offer my deepest apologies for failing to preserve that specimen of Thasserian culture."

Mientras los servidores se afanaban en conectarlo con la chispa de la máquina, se oyeron unos ruidos aterradores, seguidos de un... olor espantoso. Sin embargo, mi solicitud de repararlo enfureció tanto a los visioingenieros que no osé importunarlos con más preguntas. Por desgracia, después de un tiempo, el hedor se volvió insoportable, y después llegaron los gusanos...». {n}El Factótum te lanza una mirada culpable y suspira con pesadez.{/n} «En pocas palabras, ha sido necesario destruir el cogicor. Mis más sinceras disculpas por no haber conseguido preservar tal espécimen de la cultura thasseriana».

languages.text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}、ご覧の通り、これは少々…故障しています。サーヴィターが機械の火花に接続している最中、突然恐ろしい音が聞こえ、その後に…ひどい悪臭が漂いました。しかし、修理を依頼したところ、機関整備師たちを激怒させてしまい、それ以上質問する勇気がありませんでした。ところが、しばらくすると悪臭が耐えられないほど強くなり、さらにウジ虫まで湧いてしまいました…」{n}ファクトタムはあなたに申し訳なさそうな目を向け、重いため息をついた。{/n}「要するに、コギコルは処分せざるを得なかったのです。タッセーラ文化の貴重な標本を保存できず、深くお詫び申し上げます」
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a tad... broken. While the servitors were busy connecting it to the machine spark, terrifying noises were suddenly heard, followed by a... horrible smell. However, my request to have it repaired so infuriated the Enginseers that I dared not pester them with any further questions. Alas, after a while, the stench became unbearable, and then came the maggots..." {n}The Factotum casts a guilty glance at you and sighs heavily.{/n} "To put it briefly, the Cogicor had to be disposed of. I offer my deepest apologies for failing to preserve that specimen of Thasserian culture."

languages.text: "Şey {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Biraz bozuldu da... Hizmetörler onu makine kıvılcımına bağlarken korkunç sesler yükseldi, hemen ardından da fena bir koku bastı ortalığı. Onarım talebim Mühedyumları öyle hiddetlendirdi ki bir soru daha sormaya cesaret edemedim. Derken o iğrenç koku iyice çekilmez oldu, üstüne kurtçuklar peyda oldu..." {n}Kâhya, suç dolu bir bakış fırlatıp derin bir nefes veriyor.{/n} "Velhasıl Kavrasar'ı imha etmek mecburiyetinde kaldık. Thassera kültürünün nadide numunesini koruyamadığım için affınıza sığınırım."
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, it is a tad... broken. While the servitors were busy connecting it to the machine spark, terrifying noises were suddenly heard, followed by a... horrible smell. However, my request to have it repaired so infuriated the Enginseers that I dared not pester them with any further questions. Alas, after a while, the stench became unbearable, and then came the maggots..." {n}The Factotum casts a guilty glance at you and sighs heavily.{/n} "To put it briefly, the Cogicor had to be disposed of. I offer my deepest apologies for failing to preserve that specimen of Thasserian culture."

Thassera kültürünün nadide numunesini koruyamadığım için affınıza sığınırım."
